data.text:
Division Of Sanitation – 732-349-4616

Shawn P. Thomas, CPWM

Director of Sanitation & Recycling

Kevin Meyer

Supervisor of Sanitation & Recycling

Joe Vannella

Assistant Supervisor of Sanitation & Recycling

Doug Fisher

Assistant Supervisor of Sanitation & Recycling

Responsible for all aspects of solid waste collection and transportation to the authorized landfill.

Administers Programs and enforces government regulation pertaining to waste disposal and environment issues.

Responsible for all aspects of recycling collection.

Provide compost, wood chips and root mulch for residents.

Administers the Clean Community Program which allows Berkeley Township to give different organizations the opportunity to raise money for their group, Eagle Scout Projects and Adopt-a-Spot/Road, which helps to keep our community clean.

2024 Document Shredding Schedule Starts in April

Clean-Out Requests

Clean-Out/Move out Request Form

Fee: $250Payment must be made with the form above filed out it can be mailed to :

Berkeley Township Sanitation Department

P.O. Box B

Bayville, NJ 08721
